description: The student will undertake a research project built upon the project that he/she has undertaken under IE5906A. The student must first define the further development work beyond the project under IE5906A that needs to be done. Where appropriate, the work may include a comprehensive literature survey, problem definition, model building, development and implementation of solution method, discussion of solutions and recommendation. This module is offered as an elective module to fulfill the requirements for the Specialization in Service Systems. The module is to be completed in 1 semester.
title: Research Project in Service Systems II
